original_title: Playa Limbo: De Dias Y De Noches
overview: Playa Limbo celebrates its 10-year history with the release of a CD and DVD entitled “De Días y de Noches”, recorded Live at the Roberto Cantoral Cultural Center in October, where the essence of group in the presence of fans, with songs co-authored with other authors, under the record label Seitrack Music and produced by Armando Ávila.
title: Playa Limbo: De Dias Y De Noches
